required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study (Preliminary Study) of Ritonavir Versus NORVIR in Healthy Chinese Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Randomized Bioequivalence Study (Preliminary Study) of Ritonavir Versus NORVIR in Healthy Chinese Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital of Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetics and bioequivalence of Ritonavir tablet 100 mg versus NORVIR 100 mg tablet in healthy Chinese adult participants under fasting condition.

detailed_description.textblock: The study design is an Open-Label Randomized, Single-Dose, 2-way Crossover Bioequivalence Study with a washout period of 6 days. During each session, the subjects will be administered a single dose of 100mg Ritonavir (one Ritonavir Tablet 100mg or one NORVIR Tablet 100mg) under fasting condition.

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax: Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration for ritonavir
primary_outcome.description: Maximum observed plasma concentration (Cmax) is the peak plasma concentration of a drug after administration, obtained directly from the plasma concentration-time curve.
Time to Reach the Maximum Plasma Concentration

primary_outcome.measure: AUC(0-inf): Area Under the Plasma Concentration-time Curve from Time 0 to Infinity for ritonavir
primary_outcome.time_frame: Time Frame: 36 hours post-dose on Day 1,7,13 and 19
primary_outcome.description: AUC (0-inf) is a measure of total plasma exposure to the drug from time zero extrapolated to infinity

primary_outcome.measure: AUC(0-36h): Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time 0 to 36 hours Postdose for ritonavir
primary_outcome.description: AUC(0-36h) is measure of area under the plasma concentration and time curve from Time 0 to 36 hours postdose.

arm_group.description: During the study session, healthy subjects will be administered a single dose of Ritonavir or Tablet 100mg or NORVIR tablet 100mg under fasting condition. Intervention: cylcle 1 Drug: Ritonavir tablet 100mg cylcle 2 Drug: NORVIR tablet 100mg cylcle 3 Drug: Ritonavir tablet 100mg cylcle 4 Drug: NORVIR tablet 100mg

During the study session, healthy subjects will be administered a single dose of Ritonavir or Tablet 100mg or NORVIR tablet 100mg under fasting condition. Intervention: cylcle 1 Drug: NORVIR tablet 100mg cylcle 2 Drug: Ritonavir tablet 100mg cylcle 3 Drug: NORVIR tablet 100mg cylcle 4 Drug: Ritonavir tablet 100mg

intervention.description: Ritonavir Tablet 100mg is a generic product manufactured by Ascletis Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd.
NORVIR Tablet is a generic product manufactured by AbbVie. NORVIR Tablet 100mg will be used as a comparator drug for the BE study.

facility.name: First affiliated hospital of Zhejiang University
First affiliated hospital of Zhejiang University

patient_data.ipd_description: There is no plan to make individual participant data (IPD) available to other researchers
